SEARCH
Package com.budgetapp.reminder

Class ReminderManager

java.lang.Object
com.budgetapp.reminder.ReminderManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Subject
public class ReminderManager extends Object implements Subject
Manages reminders for users, providing functionality to add, edit, delete, and summarize reminders. It also implements the Subject interface to notify observers when a new reminder is added.

    • getInstance

      public static ReminderManager getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of ReminderManager.
      Returns:
      the single instance of ReminderManager

    • add

      public boolean add(String UUID, String title, String description, String date, String time)
      Adds a new reminder to the user's record and notifies observers.
      Parameters:
      UUID - the unique identifier of the user
      title - the title of the reminder
      description - the description or note for the reminder
      date - the date the reminder is scheduled for
      time - the time the reminder is scheduled for
      Returns:
      true if the reminder was successfully added; false otherwise

    • delete

      public boolean delete(String UUID, int id)
      Deletes a reminder from the user's record by its ID.
      Parameters:
      UUID - the unique identifier of the user
      id - the ID of the reminder to delete
      Returns:
      true if the reminder was successfully deleted; false otherwise

    • edit

      public boolean edit(String UUID, int id, String title, String description, String date, String time)
      Edits an existing reminder in the user's record.
      Parameters:
      UUID - the unique identifier of the user
      id - the ID of the reminder to edit
      title - the new title of the reminder
      description - the new description of the reminder
      date - the new date for the reminder
      time - the new time for the reminder
      Returns:
      true if the reminder was successfully edited; false otherwise

    • summary

      public List<String> summary(String UUID)
      Returns a list of summary strings for all reminders of the user.
      Parameters:
      UUID - the unique identifier of the user
      Returns:
      a list of reminder summaries; empty if none exist
